column4: Help, I have two installations of Ubuntu, logged into AIM with Empathy on both, but the share my desktop button is grayed out
And  there's like no information about empathy im client online
How do I share desktop with Empathy?
I want to do remote desktop between my Ubuntu and between a live cd
Help, I have two installations of Ubuntu, logged into AIM with Empathy on both, but the share my desktop button is grayed out
It only says I can share my desktop over local network.
well, you need to share it on one machine, the on the other, go to Applications ----->Internet---->Remote Desktop Viewer
I want to do a support for someone who's not on my desktop
you know, like TeamViewer, or iChat desktop share
I don't see any option in Empathy about remote desktops
You right click a contact and it says "share my desktop"
well, I don't know then. I've never done it that way. I would use VNC or something.
